description:
The official KFC South Africa app lets you order your KFC favorites in a number of ways:

•	Order online on the app for quick collection/pickup at your nearest KFC
•	Delivery available from selected KFC restaurants
•	Depending on your nearest KFC, choose between picking up in-store (from the front counter), or collection via the Drive-Thru (where available) 
•	Contactless payment: To protect you and our team, please consider paying online for a faster and fully contactless experience
•	Or, buy someone a KFC digital gift voucher sent straight to their phone


Simply register an account to start browsing the KFC delivery or collection menu and you’ll be enjoying our original recipe chicken in no time. Plus, get access to online exclusive deals you can only get through the KFC South Africa app.

Mr D is Mzansi’s favourite convenience delivery service, here’s why:

• 11000+ restaurants/stores and over 300 Pick n Pay grocery stores all on one app
• 2600+ areas across South Africa
• Find favourites like KFC, McDonalds, Chicken Licken, Burger King, Nando’s, Spur, Simply Asia, Wimpy, Steers, RocoMamas, Roman’s Pizza, Kauai and Pick n Pay Liquor.
• Get Pick n Pay groceries at in-store prices delivered within an hour.
• Shop from a wide range of over 10,000 Pick n Pay products and earn Smart Shopper points.
• No nasty hidden fees at checkout.
• Pay with cash, card, eBucks or EFT. Simple and safe.
• Get daily deals and regular promotions from your favourite restaurants and Pick n Pay groceries.
• Get daily deals and regular promotions from restaurants, Pick n Pay groceries, TakealotNOW, and shops!
• Track every step of your order in real time.

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Download the Spur Steak Ranches app and earn rewards for FREE!

Features:
● Order food online for collection or delivery
● Order and earn points
● Scan your bill and earn points
● Add your kids for great rewards
● Find a restaurant
● Buy eGift vouchers

Order Takeaway and Delivery
Easily order from your favorite Spur Steak Ranches using our app. Choose to pick up your meal or have it delivered straight to your door. Enjoy the taste of Spur from the comfort of home with our convenient new delivery option!

Earn Points Towards Vouchers
Earn points with every order. Simply scan your bill at the restaurant or earn points ordering via the app.

Loyalty & Rewards
Earn a R50 loyalty voucher after you’ve spent R1 000 at any one of our Spur restaurants. By being a member of our family, you get access to exclusive promotions, and vouchers.

Kids’ Rewards
Have your little one join our Secret Tribe to receive a free kids’ meal, soda or fruit juice, and ice cream on their birthday. They also receive a free kids’ soda when ordering any kids' meal.

Find a Restaurant
Whenever you’re craving a burger, steak, ribs or a sweet treat, use our app to find your nearest Spur Steak Ranches restaurant.

eGift Vouchers
Use our app to purchase eGift Vouchers to spoil your friends and family.

Leave a review and help us improve your Spur app experience!

description:
You can now order and pay for your favourite pizza through the official Debonairs Pizza app. Find your nearest restaurant, choose from our range of pizzas, subs & sides, customise your order and checkout.
 
Use this app to order from Debonairs Pizza restaurants in South Africa.
 
Features:
 
- Find nearby restaurants or search by area
- Browse the menu and latest promotions
- Customise your order with toppings and sauces
- Order for collection or delivery
- Choose to pay with cash or pay securely online
- Create an account for quick and easy checkout
- View your recent orders and easily reorder
- Save your addresses to speed up future ordering

How Refreshi Works:
Download the app to explore the map, finding nearby restaurants, cafes, grocery stores, and shops with unsold food. 

Browse a variety of Surprise Bags, each filled with tasty, unsold food. From baked goods, fruit & veg to pizzas and burgers, the options are endless. Prices start from as low as R 30, providing an affordable and sustainable way to enjoy quality meals. 

Confirm your purchase through the app to secure your spot and rescue these tasty treats. Your contribution not only saves you money but also actively reduces the impact on the planet. 

Head to the selected store at the collection time to collect your Surprise Bag. Enjoy!

Why Refreshi?
Access quality food at affordable prices: Satisfy both your taste buds and wallet.

Variety and Choice: Refreshi is partnering with a huge selection of both local favourites and renowned stores and takeaway brands with surplus food.
Easy Purchase Process: The app's user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and purchase Surprise Bags.
Convenient Rescues: Collect your rescued meals at the pre-set time, ensuring a hassle-free experience.

Join the Refreshi Community:
Become a part of a community that believes in bringing new life to surplus food and providing more affordable meals.

Are you ready for a world of doughnuts? Get the app that brings you the sweetest news from Krispy Kreme SA while also rewarding you for every time you get your favourite treats. As you earn Krispy Kreme loyalty points, you’ll be able to spend these points on Krispy Kreme merchandise, doughnuts, coffee, or our delicious chillers. You can also earn stamps every time you purchase any dozen doughnuts, and you get your 12th dozen FREE.
We also gift you doughnuts when it’s your birthday AND you’re able to redeem weekly deals exclusive APP users.
Get the app now to be part of the sweet world of Krispy Kreme South Africa.

Olà, vida fans! Our updated mobile app offers you the following:

1. Earn loyalty.
- You earn 5% from every purchase paid for with the vida app. This is added to your loyalty balance which can be used to pay in-store or to send vouchers to your friends.

2. Order Ahead
- Pre-order, pay for your beverage and beat the queue. Find a participating store nearest to you, select what you would like to order, choose a pickup time & pay for your purchase using your linked credit card. Track your order once it has been placed.
 
2. Pay with your mobile.
- It’s fast and easy. Link your credit card (it’s secure), enter your unique vida PIN, add a tip if you would like, and scan the QR code generated on your mobile screen to complete the payment.

4. Send a vida voucher to a friend.
- vida fans can now share the love by making in-app purchases for vida vouchers to the value of R50 with R25 increments. These vouchers can easily be shared with friends who will then be able to redeem the full value of the voucher at their nearest participating vida store.
 
5. Store Locator.
Find the nearest store to you, get directions to the store and find store details like address, telephone number and trading hours.
 
6. Tip your barista
If you are paying with your mobile phone, you will have the option to tip your barista through the app!

Welcome to the official BURGER KING® South Africa App where you have access to exclusive offers that give you great savings. All in the palm of your hand!
 
OFFERS
These offers are easy to find and simple to use. Simply select your deal, then present the offer code to your BK® cashier at the restaurant to redeem. We refresh offers frequently, so the savings never get stale. So make sure you're updating your list of offers.

With the Wimpy Rewards App you’ll be coining it! Every time you enjoy a meal with us you’ll be earning cashback in Wimpy Coins, which you can use to pay for your favourite meals and drinks. To earn or redeem Coins, just scan your Wimpy bill. Easy, right?  
 
You can also send gift vouchers to friends and family members, settle the bill by linking it to your bank cards, make use of a state-of-the-art restaurant locator and enjoy loads of special offers.  We’ll even treat you to a FREE Cappuccino if you download it today.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

Zulzi: Groceries in 15 Minutes

WE ARE Zulzi - your online supermarket. Order groceries via our app and in just 15 minutes we'll deliver your shopping right to your door. Fruit and vegetables, fresh food, chilled drinks, household items, and liquor at supermarket prices are delivered from 6:00 AM to 22:00 PM every day.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. Download the app
2. Enter your address
3. Browse our wide selection and choose your products
4. Place your order
5. Get your purchase delivered in 15 minutes

OUR SELECTION OF PRODUCTS

Have everything conveniently and easily delivered to your home: discover our selection of fresh fruits and vegetables, delicious snacks, and a variety of drinks for your after-work sundowner. We have red wine, we have white wine, and a wide selection of exciting beers.

Speaking of locals, we deliver bread from your favorite neighborhood bakery, salads & bowls from the young start-up next door, and meat from the traditional family-owned butchery in the surrounding area.

But what about your favorite brands? Maybe the name Häagen-Dazs can convince you. Or do you prefer Coca-Cola, M&M's, Haribo, Pringles, SAB, Unilever, and others? We have them all!

CONTACTLESS PAYMENT - CONTACTLESS DELIVERY
We deliver your shopping directly to your door. No supermarket crowds. No lugging. Secure, contactless, and convenient shopping.

15 MINUTE DELIVERY

We give you the time you would otherwise spend in the supermarket queue. Time to do yoga, hang up the laundry, play FIFA, take a power nap or do a power workout!
With our short delivery time, you'll just make it to put on the coffee or take out the trash before we're already ringing your doorbell.

PAYMENT METHODS
At Zulzi, you can pay easily and securely - by credit card, EFT payments, or Cash.

DELIVERING ON YOUR SCHEDULE

To fit your personal rhythm, we're here for you from 6:00 AM to 22:00pm. Always from Monday to Sunday, within 15 minutes

Find Your Spot

Stay in the Loop
Be the first to know about new offers, special discounts and all things Platō.

Imagine experiencing the best a city has to offer in just one day. Now, imagine buying it all instantly with a few taps. That’s FOMO.

An app that brings spontaneity to life, offering you thrilling activities, luxurious spas, top-notch accommodations, and gourmet restaurants in South Africa and Dubai.

Download the Panarottis App for FREE and order your favourite Italian meals!

Features:
● Order food online for takeaway or delivery
● Order and earn points
● Scan your bill and earn points
● Add your kids for great rewards
● Find a restaurant
● Buy eGift vouchers

Order Takeaway and Delivery
Conveniently order from your favourite Panarottis using our app. Choose to collect your order or have it delivered right to your doorstep. Enjoy our delicious Italian meals from the comfort of your home with our new delivery feature. 

Earn Points Towards Vouchers
Earn points with every order. Simply scan your bill at the restaurant or earn points ordering via the app.

Loyalty & Rewards
Earn points each time you visit one of our restaurants. Earn a rewards voucher when you've earned 5000 points. You'll also have access to exclusive promotions, and vouchers.

Kids’ Rewards

Find a Restaurant

eGift Vouchers

Leave a review and help us improve your Panarottis app experience!

Download the free Dineplan app to browse availability & instantly book your favourite restaurants in South Africa.

SEARCH & BROWSE RESTAURANTS
==========================

Search through our comprehensive list of restaurants by availability, name, area or show available restaurants based on your current location. 

To help you decide where to make your reservation, browse and explore restaurants by their customer rating, cuisines on offer, location, opening hours and various other booking options.

INSTANT & REQUEST BOOKINGS
========================

There are two types of restaurants booking categories: INSTANT BOOKINGS (watermelon colour label) and REQUEST A BOOKING (turquoise label). Click on the 'Book Now' or 'Request' buttons to select a date, party size and time for your reservation.

Bookings at Instant restaurants are instantly confirmed. 
Request type bookings need to be accepted or declined by the restaurant. Note: keep a lookout for the 'medal icon' awarded to restaurants that respond promptly to booking requests. The restaurant's Average Response time is provided when tapping the turquoise label - top right on request restaurants.

YOUR BOOKINGS
=============

View your upcoming and past booking reservations, from the bookings tab. Share, edit or cancel any of your upcoming bookings; and review past bookings.

FAVOURITES
==========

Tap the 'heart icon' to save your favourite restaurants for quick & easy future bookings.

NOTIFICATIONS
============

Instant bookings are confirmed via SMS and/or email. A reminder SMS is also sent 1 day prior and on the day of your booking reservation. Guests can confirm or cancel bookings by simply replying Confirm or Cancel to this SMS/Email message.

KEY PERKS & FEATURES
==================

•	Real-time bookings
•	Quick restaurant availability search
•	Confirmation and reminders of your reservations
•	Manage your reservations on the go
•	Share your reservation and the restaurants Google Map directions with your party
•	Create a list of your favourite restaurants, for easy booking

Download our RocoMamas  app today and become part of our ‘not normal’ culture. It’s just one more reason to love RocoMamas.


Earn & Spend Vouchers
By signing up for RocoMamas loyalty, you can earn points towards vouchers that you can redeem to smash at your favourite RocoMamas restaurant.


Ordering 
This feature allows you to order directly at a Hood near you. Earn loyalty points on each order. You can now also redeem your loyalty vouchers when placing your orders on the app through Click and Collect or Delivery.


View Menu
Plan ahead and get your tastebuds drooling by browsing through our menu. The best Smash Burgers, Shakes, Mofo Hot Wings and Sweet-fire Ribs.


Find a RocoMamas restaurant.
Find your nearest RocoMamas for when you need to smash those cravings.


eGift Vouchers
Show so someone special how much they Rock! with a Rocomamas eGift Voucher. We'll send them a unique voucher code via SMS and/ or email to be redeemed at their favourite Rocomamas restaurant.

GET MORE WITH THE MUGG & BEAN LOYALTY APP

  1. Earn reward Beans & spend them any time

  2. Link your bank card to make quick, safe & contactless payments

  3. Order ahead & collect conveniently

  4. Get your Coffee Subscription & save

Earn Loyalty
You will be earning a % back for every purchase made with the app, using in-app payments or regular payment methods (credit card etc)
 
Contactless Payment
You have the ability to load your card onto the Bootlegger APP, earn & pay in one transaction. (All secured through WiGroup)
 
Sending Vouchers
Gift voucher sending is now enabled. You can send friends & family value based vouchers to their app/phone numbers and they will be able to redeem them at any nearby Bootlegger store.
 
Store Locator
Find the nearest store to you will all the relevant details, including address, number & trading hours.

Show your tastebuds a PERi-PERi good time with Nando’s. Order your favourite flame-grilled meals for takeaway or collection. Not sure what to get? Tap ‘Surprise Me’ for something sweet, spicy, veggie nice and healthy. Got a preferred PERi-PERi flavour? Save it for future orders. Craving Hot deals? Enjoy free delivery, exclusive specials, games and fiery content exclusive to the app. To wrap things up, the Nando’s app has enhanced security that’s safer than you-know-who’s game farm. Need we say more? Download the app and fire up your first Nando’s order.

With the Starbucks® app you collect stars for free drinks and unlock all further advantages of the Starbucks® Rewards program.
Here’s how it works:
- You will now get 1 Stars for every R2 spent in store.
- Every 250 Stars, have a food or drink reward on us.
- At 750 Stars, you've reached Gold Level. Gold members get additional benefits. And enjoy a Birthday drink on us too!
Get started in 3 simple steps:
1. Create an account
2. Collect Stars
3. Get rewards
